about.title: About me
about.description: Learn more about my resume and experience

web.title: Web Development
web.description: I have built web applications using modern technologies such as React and Next.js. Rather than just focusing on functionality, I designed clear and user-friendly interfaces with responsive layouts that work smoothly across devices. I integrated multiple APIs and databases to deliver fast performance and a seamless user experience. By organizing code into reusable components, I made projects easier to maintain and expand. I also applied the latest web trends and accessibility standards so that anyone can use the applications comfortably. Through experience in planning, design, and development, I developed the ability to write clean code and collaborate effectively skills that can be applied directly in real-world projects.

design.title: Graphic Design
design.description: With over three years of experience, I have built expertise in brand identity, illustration, and marketing content. Beyond creating visuals, I engage from the planning stage to translate clients’ visions and goals into effective design. By harmonizing color, typography, and imagery, I strengthen brand value and deliver creative, sustainable solutions that stand out.

a15.title: ArgentBank
a15.description: I created a responsive dashboard and managed the application’s global state using React and Redux, integrating the back end through REST API calls. I defined the API endpoints with Swagger and used Node.js to handle the server.

a14.title: 724 events
a14.description: I reviewed and fixed bugs using Chrome DevTools and React Developer Tools. I resolved issues with JavaScript and React, implemented unit and functional tests, and used Yarn and Node.js for dependency management and test execution.

a13.title: Kasa
a13.description: I developed a responsive web application using React. I set up navigation between pages with React Router and built the interface using reusable React components.

a12.title: Architecture
a12.description: I created a dynamic webpage in JavaScript, including a login page and a modal for media uploads. I integrated a backend API and used Figma for layout and implementation. I also used Kanban for efficient task tracking and collaboration.

b20.title: Invitation
b20.cy: I worked on the same type of tasks from 2021 to 2023.
b20.description: Designed and produced web and print invitations for various Fusalp events, taking charge of incorporating the brand’s seasonal identity and visual elements into the overall design. Beyond simply creating event materials, I carefully considered color palettes, typography, and layout to effectively communicate the brand’s image and message, thereby reinforcing both brand consistency and the overall event experience.

All designs were crafted to align with the brand’s identity while maintaining a sophisticated and stylish aesthetic.

aboutme.title: Turning ideas into code, code into experience.
aboutme.description: First became interested in web design naturally while working in graphic design and this led me to develop a deeper passion for web development. After completing an Integrator Web training program in France I continued studying consistently and have since grown with a strong focus on frontend development. In particular, by working with Next.js. I have gained not only frontend expertise but also the ability to handle backend features when needed giving me full-stack capabilities. In addition, while my main focus remains frontend i have also built full-stack development experience using backend services such as Firebase. Moving forward, I am seeking opportunities as a frontend web developer to actively participate in real projects, grow further and contribute meaningfully.

services.title: My expertise
services.webdes: I build web services using React and Next.js, focusing on SEO optimization, fast loading speeds, stable data handling and responsive UI to deliver intuitive and immersive user experiences.
services.optdes: By applying code splitting, lazy loading, and image optimization, I improve performance while adhering to WAI-ARIA accessibility standards to achieve higher Lighthouse scores and provide an inclusive web environment.
services.uides: I create reusable components and consistent design systems leveraging modern UI libraries such as shadcn/ui and NextUI to implement responsive interfaces. This ensures a seamless and consistent user experience across all devices.
services.maindes: I refactor existing code, fix bugs and continuously integrate new features and SEO strategies to enhance stability, visibility and long-term performance of the web.
services.deployingdes: I deploy projects efficiently using Vercel leveraging a serverless environment to deliver stable and fast web services.
